name: Stanley Kmiec
text: its a local place for us, sure do like that thin crust pizza with extra cheese and other toppings, service is good. we have also been trying the take-out service through the on-line app. they do a good job with that.

name: Amy Taylor
text: Service is completely lacking here anymore. Tried to order pizza tonight, got home to find it completely burnt. Tried to call to have it corrected and was told it wasn’t burnt? Nice customer service. This will be our last visit.

name: Matthew Weaver
text: The food was great as always at Pizza hut but the service definitely lacked. There was only one other group there but still we waited well over half an hour for our food!

name: RodIRod 3
text: First time here an I got to say very friendly service. They only reason for a 3 star is how unclean the machine looks. An the soda machine looks like it hasn't seen a good clean. Service an time waiting on a Friday night isn't long at all. …More

name: Mateo Es
text: Pretty impressed with the service here at 815p on a Monday eve. Pan pizza was cooked to perfection. What a true pan from PH should taste like. Seasoned pans.(forgot to snap photo...apologies) Salads were fresh. The brewed ice tea was the …More

name: Cidnee Walker
text: I go to this Pizza Hut regularly and have always received good service and great tasting food. However, during my last visit, Pizza Hut's payment system was down and online orders were not going through properly. Although this was not the …More

name: rdk_metalmelter
text: This is one of the better Pizza Huts around the area. Very clean and neat inside, friendly and fast service, with lots of parking.

name: Megan Niser Kennedy
text: This Pizza Hut is great! Friendly staff, clean restaurant since the remodel and delicious Pizza Hut pizza! There aren't many restaurants in the area but we love this place! Good job stepping this place up and making it a family favorite!

name: Christine Frantz
text: No air conditioning but had a fan blowing on us. Not bad with the cooler days.

name: Rachel Willard
text: Not consistent with their quality. Sometimes you'll get an overdone crust & sometimes you'll get a very undercooked crust(have to finish cooking it in your OWN oven). Service is ALWAYS slow if you dine-in! Have to box your own leftovers …More

name: Norm Wallace
text: Shabby she'll of a once proud sit down eat in pizza chain. Must have closed..this one just hanging on. Salad bar gone..tables nicked and battered,carpet threadbare..but I would return in a heartbeat because of the staff. Friendly attentive …More

name: Juan Diaz
text:
B

Very nice people

name: Sarah Ann Cerrito
text: Worst customer service. Called for take out at 6pm, was told 30 minutes. Arrived at 6:25, no one heard of my order except the cook said they were waiting on the breadsticks (ordered medium pepperoni and 2 breadsticks). Were VERY quick to …More

name: mike d
text: Pizza hut has gotten so much better than when I was young. Pretty good pricing and deals on not bad tasting pizzas.

name: Sayron
text: Permanently Closed.  Place was dark inside and staff was always flustered even when not busy

name: lorena hawk
text: The man who took my take out order was  GREAT. I'VE been to that pizza Hut many times, and never been treated as nice as I was by him. He apparently just relocated from another pizza Hut. He's been with them over 30 years....Hats off to him!

name: Jessica Dunlevy
text: Overall, a poor experience. Food came out lukewarm. Service was mediocre, at best.

name: Tom Wetzel
text: As far as value goes, this is it! The other local pizzerias just cant beat the specials when I need to cater for having my son's friends over, or for a football game. I usually order online and pick up. It never takes more than 15 minutes.  The restaurant looks nice and never seems crowded

text: Tried the hand tossed this visit and it was great!

text: The best pizza hut I ate at nice clean.  My waitress Tasha. Was fast. The food . 16.min if that.. the Little person .she was the manger .was nice. Made you feel welcome. She ask people. How their were doing.. I Will IMG TO GO BACK.

name: Boss Hogg
text: No consistency here as others pointed out. I also feel its a dirty restaurant plus the staff is nothing to write home about. The owner/franchisee cant be doing great at this location, its always empty in the dining room. Just a sad place to …More

text: Woman was polite, but odor of cigarettes was overpowering.  Restroom had not been cleaned for weeks and weeks, these employees and franchise owner obviously do not care about cleanliness. I like the product, but can not say that sitting …More

text: Great pizza deals. The bread sticks are so good! Kind friendly service.

name: Kate Mull
text: Don't eat here if you are expecting to get the deal price listed on the signs in their windows. They are too lazy to take them down when the promotion is over. No wonder no one eats here anymore.  They don't even have heat in the place, …More

text: Very friendly and filling.  I was satisfied

text:
Thank you for the great service!
Needed a nice night out and got it when I arrived here. The gentleman wayne(cj) was a doll, and so nice to us while we were there . Thank you ! Will be back soon!

text: This place is sad. They always mess the food up and service is pathetic. Last time I will ever order from this or any pizza hut.

text: Absolutely awful!!!  I received two overdone pizzas. I had them remake them...same brown crunchy cheese on the second try too!  I asked for my money back.  Wow...you would think Pizza Hut could bake an edible pizza.

text: We had a horrible customer service experience in the beginning of January. I emailed corporate and they apologized. They said someone would contact me in three business days. No contact was ever attempted by Pizza Hut. I have been a customer all my life but will no longer be.
